00022 using System;
00023 using System.Collections.Generic;
00024 using MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources;
00025 using MathNet.Numerics.Statistics;
00026 
00027 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions
00028 {
00029 
00048     public sealed class NormalDistribution : ContinuousDistribution
00049     {
00050         double _mu;
00051         double _sigma;
00052 
00053         StandardDistribution _standard;
00054 
00055         #region Construction
00056 
00061         public
00062         NormalDistribution()
00063             : base()
00064         {
00065             _standard = new StandardDistribution(this.RandomSource);
00066             SetDistributionParameters(0.0, 1.0);
00067         }
00068 
00077         public
00078         NormalDistribution(
00079             RandomSource random
00080             )
00081             : base(random)
00082         {
00083             _standard = new StandardDistribution(random);
00084             SetDistributionParameters(0.0, 1.0);
00085         }
00086 
00091         public
00092         NormalDistribution(
00093             double mu,
00094             double sigma
00095             )
00096             : base()
00097         {
00098             _standard = new StandardDistribution(this.RandomSource);
00099             SetDistributionParameters(mu, sigma);
00100         }
00101 
00102         #endregion
00103 
00108         public override RandomSource RandomSource
00109         {
00110             get
00111             {
00112                 return base.RandomSource;
00113             }
00114 
00115             set
00116             {
00117                 base.RandomSource = value;
00118                 _standard.RandomSource = value;
00119             }
00120         }
00121 
00122         #region Distribution Parameters
00123 
00127         public double Mu
00128         {
00129             get { return _mu; }
00130             set { SetDistributionParameters(value, _sigma); }
00131         }
00132 
00136         public double Sigma
00137         {
00138             get { return _sigma; }
00139             set { SetDistributionParameters(_mu, value); }
00140         }
00141 
00145         public
00146         void
00147         SetDistributionParameters(
00148             double mu,
00149             double sigma
00150             )
00151         {
00152             if(!IsValidParameterSet(mu, sigma))
00153             {
00154                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentParameterSetInvalid);
00155             }
00156 
00157             _mu = mu;
00158             _sigma = sigma;
00159         }
00160 
00167         public static
00168         bool
00169         IsValidParameterSet(
00170             double mu,
00171             double sigma
00172             )
00173         {
00174             return sigma > 0.0;
00175         }
00176 
00181         public
00182         void
00183         EstimateDistributionParameters(
00184             IEnumerable<double> samples
00185             )
00186         {
00187             Accumulator accumulator = new Accumulator(samples);
00188             SetDistributionParameters(accumulator.Mean, accumulator.Sigma);
00189         }
00190 
00191         #endregion
00192 
00193         #region Distribution Properties
00194 
00198         public override double Minimum
00199         {
00200             get { return double.MinValue; }
00201         }
00202 
00206         public override double Maximum
00207         {
00208             get { return double.MaxValue; }
00209         }
00210 
00214         public override double Mean
00215         {
00216             get { return _mu; }
00217         }
00218 
00222         public override double Median
00223         {
00224             get { return _mu; }
00225         }
00226 
00230         public override double Variance
00231         {
00232             get { return _sigma * _sigma; }
00233         }
00234 
00238         public override double Skewness
00239         {
00240             get { return 0.0; }
00241         }
00242 
00246         public override
00247         double
00248         ProbabilityDensity(
00249             double x
00250             )
00251         {
00252             double xmu = x - _mu;
00253             return Constants.InvSqrt2Pi / _sigma * Math.Exp(xmu * xmu / (-2.0 * _sigma * _sigma));
00254         }
00255 
00259         public override
00260         double
00261         CumulativeDistribution(
00262             double x
00263             )
00264         {
00265             return 0.5 * (1.0 + Fn.Erf((x - _mu) / (_sigma * Constants.Sqrt2)));
00266         }
00267 
00272         public
00273         double
00274         InverseCumulativeDistribution(
00275             double x
00276             )
00277         {
00278             return _sigma * Constants.Sqrt2 * Fn.ErfInverse(2.0 * x - 1.0) + _mu;
00279         }
00280 
00281         #endregion
00282 
00283         #region Generator
00284 
00289         public override
00290         double
00291         NextDouble()
00292         {
00293             return _mu + _standard.NextDouble() * _sigma;
00294         }
00295 
00296         #endregion
00297     }
00298 }
